DOC.brief_summary: we aim to evaluate the effects of single dose of etomidate or use of steroid prior to etomidate during emergency intubation on hemodynamics and adrenal cortex.
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose of Etomidate and Adrenal Cortex
DOC.criteria: Patients between 2565 years old with American Society of Anesthesiology scores III or IV that have applied to emergency department and receives an indication for intubation by the intensive care unit physicians will be included to the study Patients using steroid prior to the intubation and/or patients with chronical inflammatory diseases will be excluded from the study.
